titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

change.ab: Transcribed cards s1: <*> "balance due" = all crossed out, # is unreadable <*> Sept 23 = "Maudva"? "Mandva"? <*> Oct 3 = "Faust"? s2: <*> Nov 23 = "son"? "soo"?
